sentences.sContent: It’s an old car, but it’s very reliable.
sentences.sCn: 这是一辆旧车，但是性能非常可靠。

sentences.sContent: They rushed to the hospital, but they were too late.
sentences.sCn: 他们急忙赶到医院，但是已经太迟了。

sentences.sContent: We’ve invited the boss, but she may decide not to come.
sentences.sCn: 我们邀请过老板，但她有可能决定不来。

sentences.sContent: an expensive but extremely useful book
sentences.sCn: 价钱很贵却是非常有用的一本书

sentences.sContent: ‘Has he got any experience?’ ‘No, but he’s keen to learn.’
sentences.sCn: “他有经验吗？”“没有，但他非常好学。”

phrases.pCn: [美国口语]彻底地，完全；狠狠地；有力地；毫无疑问

trans.tranOther: used to connect two statements or phrases when the second one adds something different or seems surprising after the first one
